anathema: Work honestly for something you could steal instead, kill a monkey
edict: Steal luxuries for yourself, destroy property for fun, demand bribes to spare creatures from your torments
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Lahkgya (Patron of Monkeys)](/Deities.aspx?ID=615)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 322

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Vudrani Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=17)

**Edicts** Steal luxuries for yourself, destroy property for fun, demand bribes to spare creatures from your torments

**Anathema** Work honestly for something you could steal instead, kill a monkey

**Area of Concern**
Mischief, monkeys, riches

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** must choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50)

**Favored Weapon** [jaw](/Weapons.aspx?ID=356)

**Domains** [Indulgence](/Domains.aspx?ID=79), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Swarm](/Domains.aspx?ID=120), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=94)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Wealth](/Domains.aspx?ID=99)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=1531)

- **3rd**
[Mad Monkeys](/Spells.aspx?ID=1590)

- **4th**
[Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=1471)

</column>
name: Lahkgya (Patron of Monkeys)
